name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in deploying and orchestrating cloud-native systems using **AWS**, with hands-on expertise in **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **Terraform**. Experienced in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and monitoring systems with **DataDog**, **Loki**, **Grafana**, and **Prometheus**, ensuring reliable and efficient software delivery.
Skilled in scripting and automation using **Bash** and **Ansible**, with a strong background in data management utilizing **PostgreSQL** and messaging systems like **Kafka**. Additionally, adept in programming with **Python**, while leveraging extensive experience in AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. A strong advocate for compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Proven ability to streamline MLOps projects involving model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
